popt4jlib.neural.costfunction

Class L2NormReg

  • java.lang.Object
    • popt4jlib.neural.costfunction.L2Norm
      • popt4jlib.neural.costfunction.L2NormReg
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, FunctionIntf, FFNNCostFunctionIntf

    public class L2NormReg
extends L2Norm
    implements the regularized version of the L2-norm function, where besides the L2-norm of the errors, we add to the result the magnitude of the weights as a regularization component.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011-2020

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double eval(java.lang.Object arg, java.util.HashMap params)
      computes and returns ||x||_2 + λ \times; ||w||_2.
      double evalPartialDerivativeB(double[] d_per_instance)
      computes the partial derivative of this function on an array of values that is the derivative of this function on a set of training instances and labels.
      double evalPartialDerivativeB(double[] weights, int index, double[] input_signals, double true_lbl, java.util.HashMap p)
      evaluates the partial derivative of the entire network's cost function (as a function of its weights) with respect to the weight variable whose weight is given by the value of the weights array in the given index.
      double evalPartialDerivativeB(double[] weights, int index, double[] input_signals, double true_lbl, int num_insts)
      always throws exception, as this method is not supported by this class.

                   java.util.HashMap params)
        computes and returns ||x||_2 + λ \times; ||w||_2.
        Specified by:

        Overrides:
        eval in class L2Norm
        Parameters:
        arg - Object // double[]
        params - HashMap must contain the weights as double[] for key "ffnn.weights", and optionally the λ regularizer value as value for the key "ffnn.lambda" (default is 1.0)

      • evalPartialDerivativeB

        public double evalPartialDerivativeB(double[] weights,
                                     int index,
                                     double[] input_signals,
                                     double true_lbl,
                                     java.util.HashMap p)
        evaluates the partial derivative of the entire network's cost function (as a function of its weights) with respect to the weight variable whose weight is given by the value of the weights array in the given index.
        Specified by:
        evalPartialDerivativeB in interface FFNNCostFunctionIntf
        Overrides:
        evalPartialDerivativeB in class L2Norm
        Parameters:
        weights - double[] all variables (including biases) array
        index - int the index of the partial derivative to take
        input_signals - double[] the input signals for the network (an instance of the training data)
        true_lbl - double the true label corresponding to the input_signals vector
        p - HashMap
        Returns:
        double

      • evalPartialDerivativeB

        public double evalPartialDerivativeB(double[] weights,
                                     int index,
                                     double[] input_signals,
                                     double true_lbl,
                                     int num_insts)
        always throws exception, as this method is not supported by this class. The reason for not being supported is that the λ term that multiplies the L2-norm of the weights cannot be accessed here since we eliminated the parameters hash-map from the argument list in the signature of this method.
        Specified by:
        evalPartialDerivativeB in interface FFNNCostFunctionIntf
        Overrides:
        evalPartialDerivativeB in class L2Norm
        Parameters:
        weights - double[] all variables (including biases) array
        index - int the index of the partial derivative to take
        input_signals - double[] the input signals for the network (an instance of the training data)
        true_lbl - double the true label corresponding to the input_signals vector
        num_insts - int unused
        Returns:
        double
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - always

      • evalPartialDerivativeB

        public double evalPartialDerivativeB(double[] d_per_instance)
        computes the partial derivative of this function on an array of values that is the derivative of this function on a set of training instances and labels.
        Specified by:
        evalPartialDerivativeB in interface FFNNCostFunctionIntf
        Overrides:
        evalPartialDerivativeB in class L2Norm
        Parameters:
        d_per_instance - double[] must have been computed from calls to evalPartialDerivativeB(wgts,ind,train_inst,train_lbl,p).
        Returns:
        double
